Reviews.Title: “Rude personell and cockroaches to welcome you”

Reviews.Content: bad experience arrived directly airport 20 minutes trip bus receptionist speaks german saying welcome else money ive credit card looked disgusted accept creditcard visa ive searched pocket cons pockets atms payed woman country payments advance prostitutes didnt chance agree brazilian people described receptionists walking sight clean stepped bathroom nice cockroach floor window dont reasons 1 mud frame 2 barely heating thermostat max 16 centigrade internet dont forget receptionist beginning access code otherwise descend reception telephone call reception
